maintenanceEvent.eventDescription: Converted base/source XML data about the Nixon-era White House Tapes participants to EAC-CPF records using base-to-eac.xq script written by Amanda T. Ross of the United States National Archives and Records Administration

descriptiveNote.p: Representatives of the White House tour group and Charles W. Colson conversed 1 time on the White House Tapes of the Nixon Administration.
Representatives of the White House tour group and Alexander M. Haig, Jr. conversed 1 time on the White House Tapes of the Nixon Administration.
Representatives of the White House tour group and Henry A. Kissinger conversed 1 time on the White House Tapes of the Nixon Administration.
Representatives of the White House tour group and George P. Shultz conversed 1 time on the White House Tapes of the Nixon Administration.
Representatives of the White House tour group and Ronald L. Ziegler conversed 1 time on the White House Tapes of the Nixon Administration.
